scripts.test: npm run elevate && npm run build && npm run install && node test/main.test.js && npm run uninstall && echo 'Done.'
scripts.dev: npm run elevate && npm run build && npm run install && cd ../ && npm create octobox-app -- internal && cd ./octobox/create-octobox-app && npm run app:uninstall && cd ../
scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.json && minify bin/index.max.js > bin/index.js && rimraf bin/index.max.js && chmod u+x bin/index.js || exit 0
scripts.install: npm run uninstall && npm run app:install && npm run plugins:eslint:install && npm run plugins:stylelint:install && npm run plugins:utils:install
scripts.uninstall: npm run app:uninstall && npm run plugins:eslint:uninstall && npm run plugins:stylelint:uninstall && npm run plugins:utils:uninstall
scripts.app:install: npm run app:uninstall && sudo npm link || npm link
scripts.app:uninstall: sudo npm -g uninstall create-octobox-app || npm -g uninstall create-octobox-app
scripts.plugins:eslint:install: npm run plugins:eslint:uninstall && cd ../eslint-config-octobox && sudo npm link || npm link
scripts.plugins:eslint:uninstall: sudo npm -g uninstall eslint-config-octobox || npm -g uninstall eslint-config-octobox
scripts.plugins:stylelint:install: npm run plugins:stylelint:uninstall && cd ../stylelint-config-octobox && sudo npm link || npm link
scripts.plugins:stylelint:uninstall: sudo npm -g uninstall stylelint-config-octobox || npm -g uninstall stylelint-config-octobox
scripts.plugins:utils:install: npm run plugins:utils:uninstall && cd ../octobox-utils && npm run build && sudo npm link || npm link
scripts.plugins:utils:uninstall: sudo npm -g uninstall octobox-utils || npm -g uninstall octobox-utils
